import './site_cart.css' import { decreaseItemQuantity, increaseItemQuantity, calculateTotal} from '../../features/cartSlice' import { useSelector,useDispatch } from "react-redux" const SiteCart = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const allCarts = useSelector((state)=>state.cartSlice) return (
{allCarts.cartItems.length} Item
) } export default SiteCart
